definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: terebinth (= [[אֵלָה]])—´[[א]] cstr. Ge 12:6 + 4 t.; pl. cstr. [[אֵלוֹנֵי]] Ge 13:18 + 3 t.—terebinth (or other tall tree, cf. infr. on 1Sa 10:3, Ju Jdg 4:5), marking shrine, & hence used in topogr. designations; [[מוֹרֶה]] ´[[א]] (teacher's terebinth) Ge 12:6 (v. Di) so De 11:30; [[מְעוֹנְנִים]] ´[[א]] (eonjurors’ tereb.) Ju Jdg 9:37; distinguished by owner or ruler [[מַמְרֵא]] ´[[א]] Ge 13:18, Ge 14:13, Ge 18:1; by neighbouring town [[חענים]]([[ב]]) Ju Jdg 4:11; cf. [[בְּחַעֲנַנִּים]] ´[[א]] Jos 19:33 (edd. [[אַלּוֹן]], but v. Norzi Baer Di.); [[מֻצָּב אֲשֶׁר בִּשְׁכֶם]] ´[[אֵ]] Ju Jdg 9:6 (cf. [[אֵלָה]] Ge 35:4); [[תָּבוֹר]] ´[[א]] 1Sa 10:3 rd. [[דְּבוֹרָה]] ´[[א]] (& cf. [[אַלּוֹן בָּכוּת]] Ge 35:8, & [[תּׂמֶר דְּבוֹרָה]] Ju Jdg 4:5) cf. Ew:Gesch. iii. 31 Th Di Ge 35:8 (v. also sub [[אַלּוֹן]]).
